text: Faghiheh Soltani ( ; August 20, 1974) is an Iranian actress. She started her acting career on cinema in 1994 by starring in the movie "The Blue-Veiled" directed by Rakhshan Banietemad. She has acted in many movies and series.In the historical movie The Death Story of Sohrab, she played the role of Tahmineh, Sohrab's mother. == References == * *Faghiheh Soltani on Filcin Category:Iranian actors Category:Living people Category:1974 births
title: Faghiheh Soltani
